name: SnakeClassic
short_description:
This Snake game actually is my first 'big' programming project since I started learning C++. I know it's unnecessary to put it on SourceForge, but I still do it to learn how to use SourceForge and SVN.

The game is programmed in C++, and it uses my own 'Game Engine', a sort of abstraction layer on top of SDL (http://www.libsdl.org). This engine includes texture loading and drawing, timers, a menu scripter and  text-, sound- and musicmanager classes.

The game has a menu, highscore system, sound and powerups. Just try it and you 'll see :)
summary: A classic Snake game with new features.
